text: I have a lot of school assignments due and I just feel overwhelmed with the pressure to do well and also still excel in sports as well. I have a basketball competition coming up and I am also need to practice for that as well.
author: Anonymus Student

text: Hi Anonymus Student, what are you stressed about exactly, classes, expectations, sports,etc?
author: Juan

text: Hi all I feel overwhelmed with school, and I do not know what to do?
author: Anonymus Student

text: That does seem like a lot of pressure.
author: Juan

text: I recommend talking a step back and the doing something you enjoy. I know you have a lot you need to do, but it works better sometimes if you clear your mind. Meditate, listen to music, or whatever else you enjoy doing.
author: Juan
